channel.title: Ok i got a site
channel.description:
Ok, i got a site, but its freehostia, i want to make it /smf If i start it up there will comes maps, but i want to make is http://crankthatserver.freehostia.com/smf Can anyone tell me how? I mean, like this site, http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf He got it too, same as this. I dont know if this the right section but anyway thanks. [center][img]http://www.moparisthebest.org/smf/Themes/default/images/warnwarn.gif[/img] This is for several of your posts/topics. While you may mean well, you've been consistently posting in the wrong section.
Please re-read the section descriptions to ensure that you post your questions and so on in the right section.[/center]

item.title: Ok i got a site

Now it is in the right section.

item.title: Ok i got a site
item.dc:creator: @god_of_ikiliki god of ikiliki
item.description:
@god_of_ikiliki wrote:

[quote=“Taharok, post:6, topic:182156”][quote author=God of Ikiliki link=topic=243782.msg2059583#msg2059583 date=1203286238]
Congratulations moerin, you have just reached level ‘more then many’ in the ‘post useless topics’ skill.
You are now ranked 1 in the highscores.
Here have a rock as present.

I dont know if this the right section but anyway thanks.

if you can read, the title says ‘General Site Discussions’, this is not about this site aint it?
[/quote]

True, but unless he red the description, he could have took it literally and not have realized it meant This Site’s General Discussions.[/quote]Seems like he knew it if you read his first post made in this section

Read full topic
